title: New support champion idea
body:
So I was with my friend and he was like I bet the next support that comes out you will main and I'm like ok. 
So I started fantasising about what it's abilities could be then I came along a couple that would be really cool.
One could be something like the old soraka where you could give your allies and yourself mana but at a price of your own health.
Another could be something similar to a thresh hook but it could hook onto allies but unlike a thresh hook you can't reactive it to jump to them unless it was an allie. 
Another could be something that would heal but would also give the Allie a buff on ad or maybe magic resist and armor.
And then the Altimate could be like some sort of big cc like a big knock up in a zone or a targeted sort of thing 
The passive could have 2 parts one part would be something to do with currency like every 3rd minion or creep that died near you will drop 5 bonus gold or some sort of thing to do with money/gold and the other half would be something like garens where when he's out of combat he gain health much faster like 2x rate.
These are just some ideas I had can you guys tell me if you think they sound cool or if you think they are crap and I really hope a rioter looks at this 
Thanks guys XD ðŸ˜œ
